Title: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 29 December 2025
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 06:13
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Sumeet Bagadia has recommended three stocks to buy on Monday, December 29. The three stock picks by Bagadia are - MMTC, Hardwyn India, and Sagility.

Sentiment: neutral
